name: ContractId
description: Unique identifier for the overall contract/agreement between the provider and customer. May encompass multiple commitments. Links to ContractApplied in cost_data_standard_1_3.

name: ContractPeriodStart
description: Inclusive start date/time of the overall contract's duration. ISO 8601 format.

name: ContractPeriodEnd
description: Exclusive end date/time of the overall contract's duration. ISO 8601 format.

name: ContractCommitmentId
description: Unique identifier for the specific contract commitment within the contract (as assigned by the provider).

name: ContractCommitmentCategory
description: Highest-level classification of how the commitment is applied. Values: 'Usage' (usage-based commitment), 'Spend' (spend-based commitment).

name: ContractCommitmentDescription
description: Self-contained summary of the contract commitment's terms and conditions. Human-readable description.

name: ContractCommitmentType
description: Provider-assigned name for the type of commitment (e.g., '3-year Reserved Instance', '1-year CUD', 'Enterprise Discount Program').

name: ContractCommitmentQuantity
description: The amount of usage committed under the contract (for usage-based commitments), expressed in ContractCommitmentUnit.

name: ContractCommitmentUnit
description: The unit of measure for the commitment quantity (e.g., 'Hours', 'GB', 'vCPU-hours', 'Credits'). As defined by the provider.

name: ContractCommitmentCost
description: The monetary value of the contract commitment (for spend-based commitments). Used to track committed spend amount.

name: ContractCommitmentPeriodStart
description: Inclusive start date/time when this specific commitment period begins. May differ from ContractPeriodStart for multi-year contracts.

name: ContractCommitmentPeriodEnd
description: Exclusive end date/time when this specific commitment period ends. May differ from ContractPeriodEnd for phased commitments.

name: x_SubAccountId
description: [Extension] Organization/sub-account to which this commitment applies. Maps to org_slug for tenant isolation.

name: x_ServiceProviderName
description: [Extension] Name of the service provider offering the commitment. Examples: 'Google Cloud', 'AWS', 'Azure'.

name: x_CommitmentStatus
description: [Extension] Current status of the commitment. Values: 'Active', 'Expired', 'Cancelled', 'Pending'.

name: x_CommitmentUtilization
description: [Extension] Percentage of commitment utilized (0.0 to 100.0). Calculated from usage data.

name: x_CommitmentSavings
description: [Extension] Total savings achieved from this commitment compared to on-demand pricing.

name: x_Currency
description: [Extension] ISO 4217 currency code for monetary values (e.g., USD, EUR, INR).

name: x_SourceSystem
description: [Extension] System that generated the record. Examples: 'gcp_billing', 'aws_cur', 'manual_import'.

name: x_SourceRecordId
description: [Extension] Unique identifier in the source system for traceability.

name: x_CreatedAt
description: [Extension] Timestamp when the record was first created in the data warehouse.

name: x_UpdatedAt
description: [Extension] Timestamp when the record was last updated in the data warehouse.
